name: RAILGUN
description:
There are only a few of them left. Eradicate them.

RAILGUN (WIP) is a first person bunker shooter where you take your last stand against an invading force with nothing but your high-powered railgun. Use the weapon well. It's all you've got.

RAILGUN is in development and will be updated as time goes on.

Controls

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse Button (Hold) - Charge Railgun; release to shoot

Right Mouse Button - Launch Bomb (when Bomb Gauge is full)
